channel.title: Someone help 508 hd client error
channel.description: please some 1 help me... when i open my 508 hd client it loads until "loading 3d libary" or sumthing and then in the console it says .. error_game_caps_vesa ... how do i fix it please some 1 help me

item.title: Someone help 508 hd client error
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:11, topic:355393”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=451949.msg3316594#msg3316594 date=1282355710]

[quote author=klump link=topic=451949.msg3316529#msg3316529 date=1282352232]

Did you change your source that you are connecting to? Not all sources support HD.
[/quote] ths source im using is davidscape … so hd works on there
[/quote]Yea, DavidScape supports HD properly. I’d try another client :S

does it use packet 129 correctly? if not then no ur hd is fail[/quote]Of course it does, my server has supported HD for a long time… I’ve tested it, it works fine.

Did you make any changes to the source klump?

Read full topic
